Segment.name: SOI
Segment.comment: To define the source and related information about the income being reported

Field.name: TypeOfIncomeCode
Field.comment: Code defining the nature or source of income

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SOI02 or SOI03 is present, then the other is required.
